scripts.ios: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 14 Pro Max'
scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && bundle exe pod install
scripts.ios:Pod:install: cd ios && bundle exe pod install && cd ..
scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules&& yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.ios:clean: yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.aos:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-ios --mode=Debug --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:dev-release: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn ios:clean && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:staging: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn setStaging  react-native run-ios --mode=Debug --scheme "staging"
scripts.ios:staging-release: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn ios:clean && yarn setStaging  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "staging"
scripts.ios:prod: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn setProduction  react-native run-ios --mode=Debug --scheme "production"
scripts.ios:prod-release: yarn install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd .. && yarn ios:clean && yarn ios:bundle:assets && yarn setProduction  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
scripts.aos:dev: yarn install && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-android --mode=developmentDebug --appIdSuffix=development
scripts.aos:dev-release: yarn install && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-android --mode=developmentRelease--appIdSuffix=development
scripts.aos:staging: yarn install && yarn setStaging  react-native run-android --mode=stagingDebug --appIdSuffix=staging
scripts.aos:staging-release: yarn install && yarn setStaging  react-native run-android --mode=stagingRelease --appIdSuffix=staging
scripts.aos:prod: yarn install && yarn setProduction  react-native run-android --mode=productionDebug --appIdSuffix=production
scripts.aos:prod-release: yarn install && yarn setProduction  react-native run-android --mode=productionRelease --appIdSuffix=production
scripts.aos:DD-apk: yarn install && yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:DR-apk: yarn install && yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SD-apk: yarn install && yarn setStaging &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SR-apk: yarn install && yarn setStaging &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PD-apk: yarn install && yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-apk: yarn install && yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-Bundle: yarn install && yarn setProduction &&  yarn clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
